name: search_internet_duckduckgo
description: Search the internet using DuckDuckGo (free, no API key required). This tool only performs searches and returns URLs/snippets - requires fetch_webpage tool to view actual webpage content.

metadata.use_case: Search the web for current information, facts, news, or documentation. Returns URLs and snippets only - use fetch_webpage tool to read actual page content.
metadata.note: This tool only searches and returns URLs. Enable fetch_webpage tool to read actual webpage content.
